C:\Users\korku\dev\emsdk\upstream\emscripten\em++.bat -sMODULARIZE=1 -sEXPORT_NAME=CMODULE -sUSE_GLFW=3 -sFULL_ES3=1 "-sEXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=['_main','_wait','_runAgain','_nfEnd','_restart']" "-sEXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['ccall','cwrap','abort']" -sEXIT_RUNTIME=1 --preload-file=C:/Users/korku/dev/mk2/src/Vert.shader@Vert.shader --preload-file=C:/Users/korku/dev/mk2/src/Frag.shader@Frag.shader @CMakeFiles\MyProject.dir\objects1.rsp -o MyProject.js
